name: Light Crawler
description:
A first-person dungeon crawler with a procedurally generated open world.
As you explore the outside world you will come across different area types, forest, desert, tundra, etc.
Each area will feature its own enemies and dungeons.
As you level up so do your weapons, find ones you like and keep upgrading them.
The primary weapon types are magic, ranged, and melee.
You can get different lights for your lantern, green(poisons enemies affected by its light), blue(slows enemies), etc.
Weapons drop as the base item, base item with prefix buff, base item with suffix buff, base item with prefix and suffix buff, or unique item
